verses.kjv: My son, if thou wilt receive my words, and hide my commandments with thee;
verses.ct: My son, if you accept what I say and store up my instructions in your heart;

verses.kjv: So that thou incline thine ear unto wisdom, and apply thine heart to understanding;
verses.ct: if you turn your ear toward wisdom and direct your mind toward understanding;

verses.kjv: Yea, if thou criest after knowledge, and liftest up thy voice for understanding;
verses.ct: if you call out for insight and raise your voice pleading for understanding;

verses.kjv: If thou seekest her as silver, and searchest for her as for hid treasures;
verses.ct: if you pursue it like silver and hunt for it like buried treasure;

verses.kjv: Then shalt thou understand the fear of the LORD, and find the knowledge of God.
verses.ct: then you will grasp what wholehearted dedication to the LORD means, and you will discover the knowledge of God.

verses.kjv: For the LORD giveth wisdom: out of his mouth cometh knowledge and understanding.
verses.ct: The LORD is the source of wisdom; knowledge and understanding come from his mouth.

verses.kjv: He layeth up sound wisdom for the righteous: he is a buckler to them that walk uprightly.
verses.ct: He reserves true wisdom for those who do right; he is a shield to those who live with integrity.

verses.kjv: He keepeth the paths of judgment, and preserveth the way of his saints.
verses.ct: He guards the paths of justice and protects the way of those who are faithful to him.

verses.kjv: Then shalt thou understand righteousness, and judgment, and equity; yea, every good path.
verses.ct: Then you will understand righteousness, justice, and fairness — every good direction in life.

verses.kjv: When wisdom entereth into thine heart, and knowledge is pleasant unto thy soul;
verses.ct: When wisdom enters your heart and knowledge becomes something your soul delights in,

verses.kjv: Discretion shall preserve thee, understanding shall keep thee:
verses.ct: good judgment will watch over you, and understanding will protect you.

verses.kjv: To deliver thee from the way of the evil man, from the man that speaketh froward things;
verses.ct: They will rescue you from the lifestyle of evil people — from those who speak twisted words,

verses.kjv: Who leave the paths of uprightness, to walk in the ways of darkness;
verses.ct: who abandon honest living to walk down dark roads,

verses.kjv: Who rejoice to do evil, and delight in the frowardness of the wicked;
verses.ct: who take pleasure in doing wrong and celebrate the perversion of wicked people,

verses.kjv: Whose ways are crooked, and they froward in their paths:
verses.ct: whose paths are crooked and whose ways are devious.

verses.kjv: To deliver thee from the strange woman, even from the stranger which flattereth with her words;
verses.ct: They will also rescue you from the immoral woman — the seductive outsider who lures with flattering words,

verses.kjv: Which forsaketh the guide of her youth, and forgetteth the covenant of her God.
verses.ct: who has abandoned the husband she married when she was young and has forgotten the covenant she made before her God.

verses.kjv: For her house inclineth unto death, and her paths unto the dead.
verses.ct: Her house is a path that slopes down toward death, and her ways lead to the realm of the dead.

verses.kjv: None that go unto her return again, neither take they hold of the paths of life.
verses.ct: No one who goes to her finds their way back or reaches the paths of life again.

verses.kjv: That thou mayest walk in the way of good men, and keep the paths of the righteous.
verses.ct: So follow the example of good people and stay on the paths that the righteous walk.

verses.kjv: For the upright shall dwell in the land, and the perfect shall remain in it.
verses.ct: Those with integrity will live securely in the land, and the blameless will remain in it.

verses.kjv: But the wicked shall be cut off from the earth, and the transgressors shall be rooted out of it.
verses.ct: But the wicked will be removed from the land, and those who are unfaithful will be torn out of it.
